info.name: Prakriti AI - Complete API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Prakriti AI - Ayurvedic Health & Wellness Platform.

Deployed URLs:
- Backend: https://prakriti-api.onrender.com/api
- Chatbot: https://dietician-chatbot.onrender.com

Test User:
- Email: test@prakriti.ai
- Password: Test@123

Steps:
1. Run 'Login' request first to get token
2. Token is auto-saved to collection variable
3. All authenticated requests use {{token}} automatically

exec: console.log('Meal Food Item ID saved:', res.data.id);
